backend/main.mo: Defines the Ribbit canister with storage mixins, access control, user data structures, ponds, posts, ribbits, likes, tags, and activity tracking types.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two features, their related files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose and behavior of key frontend files and pages.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file setting up the root element and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the application router, route definitions, theme provider, and root layout.
frontend/src/components/BookmarkButton.t: Bookmark toggle button component that manages bookmark state and interaction for lilies.
frontend/src/components/CommentItem.tsx: Renders a single comment with avatar, metadata, content, and optional like and reply controls.
frontend/src/components/EmojiReactions.t: Interactive emoji reaction bar supporting multiple reaction types with counts and hover effects.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with navigation links and attribution using a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Responsive header with navigation, search handling, user avatar, and mobile/desktop search UI management.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Page layout composing header, footer, outlet content, and a mobile sidebar drawer with auto-close on route change.
frontend/src/components/LeftSidebar.tsx: Sidebar listing navigation links and recent activities with active-route highlighting and activity fetching.
frontend/src/components/LilyCard.tsx: Displays a post preview with counts, avatar, tags, like/share actions, and image frame handling.
frontend/src/components/LilyImageFrame.t: Renders images with 4:3 aspect handling and blurred backdrop for non-standard aspect ratios.
frontend/src/components/MobileLeftSideba: Mobile sliding drawer wrapping the LeftSidebar with scroll locking and backdrop behavior.
frontend/src/components/PondAboutSidebar: Shows pond details, moderators, stats, and join/leave actions with loading states.
frontend/src/components/PondCardJoinCont: Join button for pond cards with mutation handling and disabled state when already a member.
frontend/src/components/PondMobileHeader: Responsive mobile header for a pond showing banner, profile image, description, and tab navigation.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Displays a post with votes, metadata, content preview, image, tag, and comment/view counts.
frontend/src/components/ProfileRibbitIte: Renders a user’s ribbit on their profile with avatar, timestamp, linked post title, and a link to the conversation.
Popover emoji picker that lets users insert preset emojis via a button tray.
frontend/src/components/RibbitItem.tsx: Displays a ribbit with nesting, avatar, like/reply actions, timestamps, and optional reply form.
frontend/src/components/RibbitMiniBlurAv: Progressively loads an avatar image using a tiny blurred placeholder with smooth transition.
frontend/src/components/RightSidebar.tsx: Right sidebar showing trending ponds, popular tags, and recent popular posts with loading states.
frontend/src/components/search/MobileSea: Implements a full‑screen mobile search modal with trending searches, suggestions, and query handling.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchDro: Renders a dropdown showing trending searches or suggestions based on the current query.
frontend/src/components/TagHubRightSideb: Sidebar listing top, trending, and newest tags using shared tag stats modules.
frontend/src/components/UnderlineTabs.ts: Provides wrapper components for tab lists and triggers with underline styling.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBookmarks.ts: Manages bookmarked lily IDs with localStorage persistence and helper functions to modify them.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebounce.ts: Provides a debounced value hook that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth state, login flow, stored identity loading, and provides context to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useMediaQuery.ts: Tracks whether a media query matches using window.matchMedia.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for fetching and mutating ponds, posts, profiles, and related backend data via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, color variables for light and dark themes, and custom utility classes for UI styling.
frontend/src/lib/formatNumber.ts: Formats large numbers into compact notations like k, M, and B with one-decimal rounding.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Provides client-side image validation, GIF detection, resizing, and compression using canvas with multiple format optimizations.
frontend/src/lib/pondNameValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes pond names to strict alphanumeric lowercase and returns user-friendly errors.
frontend/src/lib/shareLily.ts: Shares a lily link via Web Share API with clipboard and textarea fallbacks plus toast notifications.
frontend/src/lib/tagValidation.ts: Validates and normalizes optional alphanumeric tags and returns descriptive validation errors.
frontend/src/lib/user.ts: Manages usernames, user IDs, and Froggy Phrase recovery using localStorage with hashing and backup logic.
frontend/src/lib/viewCountCooldown.ts: Tracks per-lily view cooldowns in localStorage to limit view count increments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an About page describing Ribbit, its features, and community guidelines with styled sections.
frontend/src/pages/AllPondsPage.tsx: Lists all ponds, shows loading and empty states, and displays each pond with image, description, and join controls.
frontend/src/pages/CreateLilyPage.tsx: Form for creating a lily with text, image, or link, including tag suggestions, validation, and image compression.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePondPage.tsx: Form to create a new pond with name validation, description fields, and compressed banner/profile image uploads.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Allows creating text, image, or link posts with pond selection, image compression, and client-side validation.
frontend/src/pages/FrogProfilePage.tsx: Displays a user's profile, avatar, posts, and comments with loading and not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed showing lilies with trending/new sorting, search results, sidebars, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/LilyPage.tsx: Displays a single lily with ribbits, likes, views, and reply creation, handling view count increments and sorting.
frontend/src/pages/PondAboutPage.tsx: Shows pond details such as description, visibility, moderators, and join/leave actions with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PondPage.tsx: Renders a pond’s feed of lilies with sorting, membership handling, and mobile/desktop layouts.
frontend/src/pages/PostPage.tsx: Displays a full post with content, image, link, metadata, and threaded comments with creation support.
frontend/src/pages/SavedLiliesPage.tsx: Lists locally bookmarked lilies, loading each individually and allowing removal.
frontend/src/pages/TagHubPage.tsx: Shows top, trending, and newest tags with stats, navigation, and tabbed browsing.
frontend/src/pages/TagPage.tsx: Renders a tag-specific feed with sorting, canonical tag redirects, and sidebars, fetching lilies by tag. Displays tag metadata and updates the view based on sort selection.
frontend/src/pages/UserSettingsPage.tsx: Implements a multi-tab user settings interface for username changes, avatar upload, froggy phrase management, pond membership, and admin tools. Integrates many queries and mutations to update user profile and related data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins. Extends theme tokens for UI components like sidebar, charts, and radii.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature tracking, and pending requests for adding join buttons to pond cards. Describes current project state and configuration fields.
